caption: Instructions
steps: Kind user, thank you for accepting this task. We will collect your opinion on specific book editions. For each book, we'll give you some questions about the specific edition we chose, and we'll ask you to express your preferences on an optimal scale for the context of the question.

caption: Task Description
steps: Before starting the main survey, we kindly ask you to answer a couple of questions aimed to create a general background of the user literature preferences.
For each book's edition, it will be reported its main informations, in order to help the user to identify best the edition and the book we chose.

The books will be displayed in a casual order. The user must answer all the presented questions and fill in all the fields to get their reward. If the user has not read the said book, or has not read that particular edition, there will be an apposite field for this case.
